member.name: DXGI_INFO_QUEUE_MESSAGE
member.summary: Describes a debug message in the information queue.

member.name: DXGI_INFO_QUEUE_MESSAGE.Producer
member.summary: A DXGI_DEBUG_ID value that identifies the entity that produced the message.

member.name: DXGI_INFO_QUEUE_MESSAGE.Category
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the category of the message.

member.name: DXGI_INFO_QUEUE_MESSAGE.Severity
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the severity of the message.

member.name: DXGI_INFO_QUEUE_MESSAGE.ID
member.summary: An integer that uniquely identifies the message.

member.name: DXGI_INFO_QUEUE_MESSAGE.DescriptionByteLength
member.summary: The length of the message string at pDescription, in bytes.
